text: @JoeBiden Yes we are, but we were in the best financial time before covid19. Did you unleash it Joe? No, of course not. Neither did @realDonaldTrump. This argument is nonstarter. #DemocratsAreDestroyingAmerica #Flynn #Democrats #BlackLivesMatter #BlackVoteAintFree
